mapper.insert:
SELECT ('SYSNOTICE_' || LPAD(BOARD_SEQ.nextval,8,0)) FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO BOARD_TB ( BOARD_CODE , BOARD_TITLE , BOARD_DESC , RGSTUS_ID , RGDT_DT , UPDT_DT , USE_YN , BOARD_TYPE ) VALUES ( #{boardCode} , #{boardTitle} , #{boardDesc} , #{rgstusId} , sysdate , sysdate , 'Y' , '10' )
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD_TB WHERE BOARD_TB.USE_YN = 'Y' AND BOARD_TB.BOARD_TYPE = '10'
AND BOARD_TB.RGSTUS_ID IN (SELECT USER_INFO.USER_CODE FROM USER_INFO WHERE USER_INFO.USE_YN = 'Y' AND USER_INFO.USER_ID LIKE '%' || #{searchBoardRgstusId} || '%' )
AND BOARD_TB.BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchBoardTitle} || '%'

SELECT BOARD_TB.BOARD_CODE as boardCode , BOARD_TB.BOARD_TITLE as boardTitle , BOARD_TB.BOARD_DESC as boardDesc , BOARD_TB.BOARD_COUNT as boardCount , BOARD_TB.UPDT_DT as updtDt , USER_INFO.USER_ID as rgstusId , USER_INFO.USER_CODE as rgstusCode FROM BOARD_TB, USER_INFO WHERE USER_INFO.USER_CODE = BOARD_TB.RGSTUS_ID AND BOARD_TB.BOARD_CODE = #{boardCode}
